post.body: Not that I can tell from here... but I'd hate to see you melted
Not that I can tell from here... but I'd had to see you melted...
gooood morning
As in: Did you see Shooter?
Shooter? I think that was the one with Wahlberg
You better hope Cappy doesn't read this... I'm certain he thinks he's human.
My last visit to Tigard was when it was snowing. Please tell me it hasn't been continuous...
I'll see if I can call ahead and get that taken care of... Beware of cars hiding behind bushes and billboards...
Cause Oprah recommended them and they're sold out untul 2010
Did you get your pony yet? :)
A freeze-ray would really be helpful right...about...now.
Yes! A Christmas Pagent!... Something tells me the pony will be high maintenance...
What's Cappy want for Christmas?
I already got mine... you'll get yours shortly :)
Aperture, why do you mock me so?
Uploading Christmas '08. The 1-hour photo booth once defined instant gratification & was the only biz you could do in a parking lot legally
